textBeforeTable: TV Schedule //]]> document.write(' View Comments 3) Combine apples, cranberries, remaining ¼ cup sugar and 2 tablespoons flour, ginger, and vanilla in large bowl; mix well. Transfer to baking dish. Sprinkle topping over fruit. Bake until filling is bubbly and topping is golden, 55 minutes–1 hour. Serve warm or at room temperature. Add butter and pinch with your fingers to form coarse crumbs. Add water and firmly press mixture
